segments.text: My gaze drifts to the center-left, where the real action is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, probably quite young, perched precariously on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s reaching into an open cabinet, clearly targeting the "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He has such determination in his posture, it almost makes me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is already in the jar, probably grabbing a handful of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand holds a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treasures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl nearby has her arm raised, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret mission is quite endearing, if a bit naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really pushing his luck, balancing like that while reaching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he doesn't tumble backward with a crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It would be a shame for him to lose his cookies and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling gives me a jolt.
segments.speaker: PAR
